dcterms:creator: A. P. Mathur
N. O. Tippenhauer
dcterms:description: The SWaT dataset captures time-series data from 51 sensors and actuators deployed in industrial water treatment systems. This dataset spans a total of 11 days, consisting of 7 days of normal operation and 4 days for attack simulations.
dcterms:title: SWaT

dcterms:creator: A. P. Mathur
N. O. Tippenhauer
dcterms:description: The WADI dataset focuses on a comprehensive system comprising water treatment, storage, and distribution networks. It includes 123 sensors deployed throughout the system and covers 16 days, encompassing 14 days of normal operations and 2 days of attack scenarios.
dcterms:title: WADI

dcterms:creator: Y. Su
Y. Zhao
C. Niu
R. Liu
W. Sun
D. Pei
dcterms:description: The SMD dataset includes 5 weeks of data from 28 distinct server machines with 38-dimensional sensor inputs. For the experiment, two specific server machines (Machine 1-4 and Machine 2-1) were selected due to their distribution shift problems.
dcterms:title: SMD (Server Machine Dataset)

dcterms:creator: K. Hundman
V. Constantinou
C. Laporte
I. Colwell
T. Söderström
dcterms:description: The MSL dataset includes data from 19 unique machines with 27 telemetry channels. This dataset is derived from spacecraft monitoring systems.
dcterms:title: MSL (Mars Science Laboratory)

dcterms:creator: K. Hundman
V. Constantinou
C. Laporte
I. Colwell
T. Söderström
dcterms:description: The SMAP dataset comprises monitoring data from 28 unique machines with 55 telemetry channels, derived from spacecraft monitoring systems.
dcterms:title: SMAP (Soil Moisture Active Passive)

dcterms:creator: Y. Su
Y. Zhao
C. Niu
R. Liu
W. Sun
D. Pei
dcterms:description: The CreditCard dataset consists of transactional logs spanning two days, containing 28 PCA-anonymized features along with time and transaction amount information.
dcterms:title: CreditCard

dcterms:creator: Y. Su
Y. Zhao
C. Niu
R. Liu
W. Sun
D. Pei
dcterms:description: The Yahoo dataset comprises both real (A1) and synthetic (A2, A3, A4) time-series data for anomaly detection, focusing on the real-world data characterized by distribution shifts.
dcterms:title: Yahoo (A1-R20)

dcterms:creator: Y. Su
Y. Zhao
C. Niu
R. Liu
W. Sun
D. Pei
dcterms:description: The Yahoo dataset comprises both real (A1) and synthetic (A2, A3, A4) time-series data for anomaly detection, focusing on the real-world data characterized by distribution shifts.
dcterms:title: Yahoo (A1-R55)
